verses.verse: Then drew <S%H7126><s%> near the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher <S%H2660><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, of the families <S%H4940><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>; and these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of his daughters <S%H1323><s%>: Mahlah <S%H4244><s%>, Noah <S%H5270><s%>, and Hoglah <S%H2295><s%>, and Milcah <S%H4435><s%>, and Tirzah <S%H8656><s%>.

And they stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and before <S%H6440><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> and all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Our father <S%H1><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and he was not among <S%H8432><s%> the company <S%H5712><s%> of them that gathered themselves together <S%H3259><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in the company <S%H5712><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>: but he died <S%H4191><s%> in his own sin <S%H2399><s%>; and he had no sons <S%H1121><s%>.

Why should the name <S%H8034><s%> of our father <S%H1><s%> be taken away <S%H1639><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> his family <S%H4940><s%>, because he had no son <S%H1121><s%>? Give <S%H5414><s%> unto us a possession <S%H272><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the brethren <S%H251><s%> of our father <S%H1><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> their cause <S%H4941><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

The daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> right <S%H3651><s%>: thou shalt surely <S%H5414><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> them a possession <S%H272><s%> of an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> their father <S%H1><s%>'s brethren <S%H251><s%>; and thou shalt cause the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of their father <S%H1><s%> to pass unto them <S%H5674><s%>.

And thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, If a man <S%H376><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>, and have no son <S%H1121><s%>, then ye shall cause his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> unto his daughter <S%H1323><s%>.
And if he have no daughter <S%H1323><s%>, then ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>.
And if he have no brethren <S%H251><s%>, then ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>'s brethren <S%H251><s%>.

And if his father <S%H1><s%> have no brethren <S%H251><s%>, then ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto his kinsman <S%H7607><s%> that is next <S%H7138><s%> to him of his family <S%H4940><s%>, and he shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H1121><s%>: and it shall be unto the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> a statute <S%H2708><s%> and ordinance <S%H4941><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Get thee up <S%H5927><s%> into this mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim <S%H5682><s%>, and behold <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And when thou hast seen <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H622><s%>, thou also shalt be gathered unto thy people <S%H5971><s%>, as Aaron <S%H175><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> was gathered <S%H622><s%>;

because ye rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against my word <S%H6310><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%>, in the strife <S%H4808><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> me at the waters <S%H4325><s%> before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>. (These are the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah <S%H4809><s%> of Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%>.)
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Let Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of the spirits <S%H7307><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, appoint <S%H6485><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> over the congregation <S%H5712><s%>,

who may go out <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H935><s%>, and who may come in before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H3318><s%>, and who may lead them out, and who may bring them in <S%H935><s%>; that the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> be not as sheep <S%H6629><s%> which have no shepherd <S%H7462><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> thee Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, a man <S%H376><s%> in whom is the Spirit <S%H7307><s%>, and lay <S%H5564><s%> thy hand upon him <S%H3027><s%>;

and set <S%H5975><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and before <S%H6440><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>; and give him a charge <S%H6680><s%> in their sight <S%H5869><s%>.
And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> of thine honor <S%H1935><s%> upon him <S%H5712><s%>, that all the congregation of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may obey <S%H8085><s%>.

And he shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, who shall inquire <S%H7592><s%> for him by the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of the Urim <S%H224><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: at his word <S%H6310><s%> shall they go out <S%H3318><s%>, and at his word <S%H6310><s%> they shall come in <S%H935><s%>, both he <S%H1121><s%>, and all the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him <S%H5712><s%>, even all the congregation.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him <S%H3947><s%>; and he took Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and set <S%H5975><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and before <S%H6440><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>:
and he laid <S%H5564><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> upon him <S%H6680><s%>, and gave him a charge, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
